abstract: David Rubenstein, co-founder and managing director of the Carlyle Group, explains why China is such an important source of profit for the private equity company.
snippet: David Rubenstein, co-founder and managing director of the Carlyle Group, explains why China is such an important source of profit for the private equity company.
lead_paragraph: David Rubenstein, co-founder and managing director of the Carlyle Group, explains why China is such an important source of profit for the private equity company. In an interview with CNBC, he also dismissed talk of an initial public offering, saying Carlyle is “quite comfortable” as a private firm.

headline.main: Carlyle Keeping Eyes on the Dragon
